S4 class to represent QCmetrics

QCmetrics-class.Rd

Returned by the get_qcmetrics function. The QCapp method interactively visualizes the QCmetrics object.

# S4 method for QCmetrics
show(object)

# S4 method for QCmetrics
ncol(x)

# S4 method for QCmetrics
nrow(x)

# S4 method for QCmetrics
dim(x)

# S4 method for QCmetrics
colnames(x)

# S4 method for QCmetrics
rownames(x)

Arguments

object

a QCmetrics object

Methods (by generic)

  • show: show summary info

  • ncol: number of samples

  • nrow: number of probes

  • dim: number of probes and number of samples

  • colnames: returns sample IDs

  • rownames: returns probe IDs

Slots

Sample_Metrics

Contains all sample QC metrics

Probe_Metrics

Contains all probe QC metrics

samplesheet

User-provided samplesheet

ibs

List containing IBS (identity-by-state) info.

PCs

Array-wide principal components

controlPCs

Control probe principal components

heatmap_pvals

Associations between array-wide PCs and technical/biological variables

heatmap_pvals_controlPCA

Associations between control-probe PCs and technical/biological variables

cellcounts

data.frame containing predicted white blood cell proportions

controlmatrix

matrix containing control probe info

pms

data.frame containg polymethylation scores for age, smoking, alcohol and BMI

probe_qc_method

Which probe QC method is used (before or after sample QC)

sample_qc_outliers

Sample outliers and thresholds

probe_qc_outliers

Probe outliers and thresholds

detp_threshold

Detection p-value threshold used in the `get_qc_metrics()` function

beadnr_threshold

Beadnr threshold used in the `get_qc_metrics()` function

nprobes_PCA

number of probes used for array-wide PCA, either "all" or a number.

relatedness_thresholds

thresholds used for defining related samples

selected_samples

Samples selected within the QCapp.

metadata

metadata

Contents
